overview: 3 Programs in One: 1 - Energize | 2 - Tone | 3 - Sweat.  1 - Energize - Beginner Level:  Feel the power. Be the power. Unlock the strengthening, slimming, detoxifying and reenergizing of Power Yoga. Bryan Kest leads you in a vigorous workout based on the robust Ashtanga style of yoga.  | 2 - Tone - Intermediate Level:  Challenge your muscular strength, aerobic endurance, flexibility, balance, and mental stamina with Tone.  | 3 - Sweat - Advanced Level:  Looking for an advanced yoga routine? Then get ready to Sweat!
tagline: Discover the Dynamic Vitality of Being Truly Fit
title: Bryan Kest's Power Yoga
